abstracts.cdata!:
Executive Directors approved the
            Financing in the amount US$125.0 million, consisting of a
            grant in the amount of US$60.0 million and a credit in the
            amount of US$65.0 million to the Republic of Rwanda on the
            payment terms and conditions set out in the President's
            Memorandum. Executive Directors expressed support for the
            Eighth Poverty Reduction Support Financing Project and
            commended it for the close alignment with Rwanda's
            national development strategy, the Country Assistance
            Strategy, the Africa Strategy and the programs of other
            development partners. Directors encouraged continued
            attention to fiscal consolidation, the development and
            implementation of a comprehensive private sector development
            strategy, further public financial management improvements
            and continued strengthening of public sector capacity.
